definition: not to stint/to be generous (with praise etc)/to be prepared to (pay a fee, give of one's time etc)
lit. do not begrudge gems of wisdom (idiom, humble expr.); fig. Please give me your frank opinion./Your criticism will be most valuable.

sentences.english: Be Generous with praise, Cautious with friends.
sentences.chinese: 要不吝于表扬，但要慎于批评。

sentences.english: We all appreciate your unstinting help.
sentences.chinese: 我们都感谢你不吝相助。

sentences.english: I would appreciate it if you could comment. Thanks a million.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能不吝赐教，我会感激不尽的。

sentences.english: China is not shy of using its growing economic clout.
sentences.chinese: 中国绝不吝于运用其日益增长的经济影响力。

sentences.english: Be Generous With Praise , Cautious With Criticism.
sentences.chinese: 要不吝于表扬，但要慎于批评。

sentences.english: The contents above are original. Never refuse to offer your kind advice.
sentences.chinese: 以上内容乃原创，若有更好的建议请不吝赐教。

sentences.english: Your criticism is welcome since I am also an English learner.
sentences.chinese: 我也是个英语学习者，故望各位不吝赐教。

sentences.english: We are not afraid to sing and dance, spreading our joy and including everyone when we are happy.
sentences.chinese: 我们从不吝于载歌载舞，在幸福时刻与大家共享欢乐。

sentences.english: If anyone has more information about these chipsets, please enlighten me.
sentences.chinese: 如果有谁知道更多关于芯片组的消息，请不吝赐教。

definition: to empty one's pocket/to give everything to help sb
to shed tears of gratitude (idiom); moved to tears
